OOC: So like they say my friends you lose.

BIC: A shuttle from the future, in the Angelions time comes out of 
transwarp space. A beam shoots towards Africa and scans a black 
panther. Inside the bot is given this beast mode and REFORMATED. He 
has the same weapons as Optimus Prime in BM except he can only 
partially absorb the weapons fire. He opens a com link to his own 
time.

Bot: This is Optimus Fury. I am proceeding toward the inferior 
Angilions. They will agree to be reformatted or they will join 
millions of "accidental" deaths since the Maxis and Preds hunted down 
and destroyed Cheetor's team and killed most of there followers in 
attempts to deformat them. Because we are the Malacons. We live in 
secret, and destroy those inferior to us.

Comm: Good. Don't return without a prize, reformatted or dead. Soon 
with a little elbow grease (lol) we will be 2% of the population and 
the Angelions will still be clueless about us.

He proceeds to "destroy the evidense" by aiming his shuttle at the 
Atlantic Ocean and parachuting out over England. When he lands he 
goes to Beast Mode.

OF: Stealth Mode.

Holograms make him look like a real panther.

OOC: I made sure he wasn't illegal, but you can't accept him without 
BM. Try to denig it now.
